titles.title: A resolution congratulating Jayden Daniels for winning the 2023 Heisman Memorial Trophy.
A resolution congratulating Jayden Daniels for winning the 2023 Heisman Memorial Trophy.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary: This resolution congratulates Jayden Daniels as the recipient of the 2023 Heisman Memorial Trophy. The Heisman Memorial Trophy is awarded annually to the nation's most outstanding college football player.
